resources.string: if you have any exception in bigbang，you can switch mode "Monitoring the text "to see the effect。

\t\t\tIf this product have some use abnormalities, including monitor does not work, or program is often-cleaned, please ensure that you have to add this product to a list of phone housekeeping clean white-lists, and allows it starts\n\t\t\tSince this product is made by some technical means to obtain you click or copy the words, and some of the application is not fully in conformity with the standards, so I can\'t get right to the text, switch monitoring text could only a partial solution。\n\t\t\tIf you find any problems, please use feedback function to contact us, we will solve your problem as soon as possible！
BigBang 是您的快捷助手，您可以在任意app中对文字进行编辑，包括分词，翻译，复制以及动态调整，希望您能在日常生活中获得便利

Cloud word segmentation \n Combine common word words together, enabled by default
Local word segmentation \n splits each word apart, without the network
Whether to keep the original paragraph \n If open, the first paragraph of the text color to deepen the time to keep fragmented state

When both the notification and suspension windows are closed, a pop-up window is temporarily displayed when Bigbang is triggered, and Bigbang is activated by clicking the floating window
Set the < Control and Trigger >method first

If you select the Suspension Window Resident or Notification Bar 
 You can set BigBang's switch in it 
 If you select <Click Floating Window Trigger> 
 or < Close Suspension Window and Notification Bar > When you trigger Bigbang, a pop-up window will pop up 
 You need to < click on a floating window to activate Bigbang >
<Click the text above> to verify the effect of the settings. \n You can also change it at any time in the settings page

Click the float view trigger Bigbang
After copy or click, you need to click on the ball before the trigger Bigbang, reduce mis-triggering

We are sorry, since OCR is a paid service, and because there is no access to advertising, authors have assumed the cost of 3,000 yuan per month, now can not afford this cost. Your experience on the course could be compromised. \n You can click "How to use it for free" for more information.
How to use it for free
Our OCR times has nearly exhausted, you want a better experience, please go to Settings for the "How to Get Free OCR"
In the next few steps, you can use the free OCR feature 5000 times per month. \ n You can also donate 10 yuan to the author, and postscript need KEY, by the author to help you apply.
Step 1: Use your browser to open the URL: https://www.microsoft.com/cognitive-services/ \ n (Click to Copy URL)
Step 2: Click "My account" in the upper right corner of the page, as shown below.
Step 3: Select a suitable way to register / log on the site, the following account to log on Microsoft as an example.
Step 4: If you do not have Microsoft accounts, you need to use the mailbox to register Microsoft accounts. And then authorize the use of Microsoft account to log on to this website, as shown below.
Step 5: After login, click the button in the red box below to send the verification message.

Step 6: to the mailbox to find the verification message, click through the verification. (If you can not receive the verification message, you can repeatedly refresh the fifth step in the page, re-mail)
Step 7: After the mail authentication is successful, it will automatically jump to the following page, click the red box button.
Step 8: In the product list check the following figure shows the function, probably in the fourth row position.
Step 9: Check the "Agree Agreement", then click on the submission, as shown below.
Step 10: Copy your KEY, as shown below, and fill in the final input to the page box.
The name or URL can not be empty
Address (last search will be stitched on the word)
Left slide to edit or delete, long press to adjust position
You can set, add the default search engine used by the built-in browser
Keep Header Button At The Top
